sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Wagon Trails is a master planned community located in northeast Colorado Springs. Amenities at the Wagon Trails Rec Center include a junior Olympic-sized swimming pool, volleyball and basketball hoops, a wading pool, and 30-foot Splash Park. There is a snack bar, tennis court, barbecue grills and picnic areas.
